website_summaries.verdict: Fantastic power and versatility at a decent price.
pros: Easy to set up and use
Convenient onboard storage for extra attachments
Snap-on valve for effortless hose connection
Exceptional power at an attractive price
cons: Non-detachable detergent tank can be tricky to fill and empty/clean

customer_reviews.title: It's great if all you need is a year of service
customer_reviews.text: It's not that I hate this product. I actually liked it, but...it should have lasted more than a year. I purchased it on 8/2/2016 and one year 5 days later it will not turn on. Apprently the electric motor is caput. After several email exchanges, all I can get in the way of help is that the warranty has expired. I would not recommend this product. It should have lasted much longer, and only 5 days past the warranty I would have hoped for a bit more customer concern that what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Moore

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed to work great the first few times I used it. However, it won't power on now. I purchased this on July 5th, 2017, and wouldn't work on Aug 11, 2018. Ironically, I bought an electric pressure washer because I didn't want to deal with the carburetor gumming up all the time from the crappy gas we have in Florida. Here I am a year later, sitting here like a chump, not able to use my pressure washer. I did foresee this though and bought a supplemental warranty. Bottom line, if you buy this you should DEFINITELY buy the extended warranty, but honestly, I don't think they deserve anyone's business.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Jobsite

customer_reviews.title: This product should be on recalled
customer_reviews.text: I only used it hand full of times before something in the handle exploded and cut my hand. It took a month to get the handle replaced. Talking to the agent sounded like we were not the first to ask for a replacement. The first time using the handle the pressure ripped the hose off of the handle(was properly installed). Shredded the locking mechanism... Will be asking for money back.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Used 3 times before wearing out.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 uses in 9 months time. Now the o rings in the Handle are worn out keeping the unit from being able to build pressure. The whole thing is useless without the handle and I can't find an identical replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Junk - from the moment it arrived.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, the GFCI Plug was defective and rather than return, I replaced the plug. I used the unit briefly two times last year, one more brief time a week ago. Today, began to use again - the trigger assembly was spewing water. All connections verified good. Opening the trigger assembly, found the source was a leak in the weld of a cheap plastic pipe inside which runs 2200 PSI water from hose to wand. The most extreme example of plastic consumer garbage I've ever seen!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B.

customer_reviews.title: Only good for 12 months of light usage
customer_reviews.text: I love this product as long as when it was working. But I was able to use it for only 6 times and only for light usage. It stopped working 13 months after I purchased this product. If I knew this product could not last longer than a year, I should have pushed myself to use it sooner. Rain and heat wave prevented me from using this junk within 12 month and warranty has expiried already. I called Amazon customer help Desk. Tech told me that he will called me back, but he never did. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband for Father's Day. On ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Father's Day. On the second use, It stopped working and would not work again. Company said if 30 days was up with Amazon would have to pay to send it back to them for a replacement. I sent it back to them and it cost me over $40. I just rec'd a new one yesterday so we will see how long this one works. This is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: A. Futrell

customer_reviews.title: Small unit has limits but overall best budget friendly entry level unit available.
customer_reviews.text: I received my power washer this weekend and put it right to use. No real need for instructiins because it was just so simple. Although it is the most budget friendly of all washers, the power was perfect for my use. I used this unit to. Lean the exterior of my home. Pollen and mildew are common in my area. It wrecks the white paint and gutters on my house. I used this pressure washer to clean it pretty well and added no detergents at all. Lower power keeps it from doing damage or blastingpaint off. It will also serve well washing my vehicles. Very. Very pleased. I added the 12 dollar warranty as an added protection. Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Smokie55

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: One year after ownership the handle leaks and the motor no longer operates at the same level. Wish I never bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Airaco

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I need, and easy to use 3rd party attachments since it has 1/4" quick connects. Using it with a foam cannon to clean the car; with B&S surface cleaner to prep my deck for sealing and to clean pavement and driveway; with extension wand to clean siding and gutters. I enjoy using it and have not run out of tasks yet. I bought some quick connects to make setup even easier. I don't use the red nozzle, but the turbo head makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pressure Washer for the House
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pressure cleaner to replace a old Husky pressure cleaner I had for many years that I really liked. The Husky finally started to leak so I looked for a similar pressure cleaner to replace it. This one works and looks very similar to the Husky (except for the color) and I am pleased with its performance. I use it to pressure clean my patio area that is a painted concrete surface and also on a small area of brick on the exterior of the house, which gets moldy and dirty over time. Hopefully it lasts just as long as the Husky.
customer_reviews.author: CGH

customer_reviews.title: It has plenty of power and easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: It has plenty of power and easy to set up and use. The only problem I had was that the to lock the collar onto the nozzle is a bit tough. You have to pull the collar up hard to lock in onto the nozzle. The more I use it the easier it has become.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Sangiorgi

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. It worked for me for about 20 minutes and completely shut off. I took time off from work to clean my deck. It arrived in a timely manner July 6, 2017. Package was in fine condition. I started to clean the deck today 7/9/2017. It worked great in the beginning, for about 20 minutes and cut off. I was so discouraged and upset. Needless to say it is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: I have had my Ivation for just about three months now, but so far it works great and would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Ivation for just about three months now, but so far it really works well and am very happy I bought it. I use it primarily to wash my new SRT Challenger, so I am very particular with everything I use on my baby. Before I made the purchase I shopped for the best all around quality unit for the best price, and this one was the winner. What I really liked about it is that has a metal connection for the water inlet and I really like that because it wont break like its plastic rivals, and that sold me on the Ivation. I would definitely recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Petroz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this item. I used it once and I must say during the first use I was very satisfied. The different tips are a nice feature and it had plenty of power for what I used it for. Unfortunately, the second time I attempted to use it, the wand was broken. It just poured water out from the handle where you depress the button. The unit was used carefully and stored in a careful and safe location. The damage was not due to abuse or negligence, it was just poorly manufactured. Unfortunately, the first use was in the fall and the second use was now in spring, so it's outside of the warranty or return period.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Great starting point for a power washer!
customer_reviews.text: Really good cleaning unit per dollar (44 CU/$). Cleans well. Soap dispenser option is meh at best, but it's a better option if you don't want to buy a foam cannon (**go buy a foam cannon**). The grip can be tiring if held for more than 30s (your mileage may vary). Wiring management option is also meh at best. Both the hose and wire can be in the way when moving the unit around, but at least it is light enough to just lift rather than using the plastic wheels.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pressure washer 3 yrs ago. It has been very reliable and is used for residential. The turbo wand does an excellent job. Without the Turbo wand the washer would get an average rating. The other nozzles are helpful but dont have the pressure as the turbo wand does. I just blew the original water line feeding the spray wand. I am currently looking for a replacement. I am not sure if the hose is a generic one or not.
customer_reviews.author: hoppper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with broken wand
customer_reviews.text: Used it once last year, and it did a great job cleaning my deck. Pulled it out today to do the deck again, and a piece inside the handle is leaking water like crazy, killing the pressure and making it useless. Can't find a replacement part, so ill have to buy a new wand and hose ($50). Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: SO BUMMED!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year and unfortunately never tried to use it until this week. I can't get the dang thing to work. It makes a weird whining noise, something like the sound of a dying cow, and water wont come out. I have done all the troubleshooting that the manual suggests so I am just assuming I am out of luck and wasted my money!
customer_reviews.author: Lambo

customer_reviews.title: Plastic insides no good
customer_reviews.text: This was a previous comment but described the exact same thing that happened to me. This washer worked once but then the plastic components inside the handle failed. The plastic pieces leaked down the crease where they were originally molded to. I attempted to fix these components with plumbers tape and flex seal but the amount of pressure they're required made repair impossible. The inbound quick latch water valve also leaked. This may have been due to the use of an x hose but I doubt it given the other issues with the components. The leaking was extensive enough to prevent any pressurization so I was forced to throw the entire thing away.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Broke, doesn't start anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a year. Was fine when it was working, though over winter the gun broke. Contacted manufacturer, they sent me a replacement for free. Used it about four times after that and then it just stopped working. Not sure what to do with it now. Read all the reviews that said this sort of thing happens, thought they weren't careful with it. I was, and it did happen to me.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Vaschuk

customer_reviews.title: I have had this unit for about 14 months, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for about 14 months, when it would no longer start. I contacted Ivation and was told it is out of warranty and would provide no help, advice or do anything for me. No I'll be buying another - certainly from a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W.

customer_reviews.title: Great electric pressure cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it on two days for a total of 9 hours of hard use. It has performed flawlessly. So far so good. The company that sold it on Amazon has been great. They have reached out to me twice offering tech support for any issues that I my have, which at this point is none. I like the pressure cleaner and the company that stands behind the product with great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: James Lanham

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a "Deal of the Day". It was delivered promptly and in good condition. Once out of the box, I had it set up and ready for use in about 5-10 minutes. The instructions are clear, the minor assembly required was a breeze, and I was using it immediately. The electric motor is quiet (much quieter than my neighbor's gas powered unit), and turns on and off based on the trigger being held in. I have used it for several backyard projects, and am very pleased. Compared to units I have seen in local "big box" stores the quality seems good, and I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Packer Fan

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put hose together: a mallet did the trick Hose connection leaked but a wrench took care of that. But try to to fix a shutdown after 30 seconds and never would restart. I just gave finally up and threw this in the dump. Recommend you buy a gas power model.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Has very long water wand hose and very long power cord
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time a week ago on my deck after being dirty from the winter months. I only used the wand with the built in pressure nossil, (The Swirl). The pressure was perfect. Cleaned very good! Putting it together was easy. The pressure washer is one piece! You only have to attach the attachments. I can’t wait to try the other wand with the different pressure nossil attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Delivered

customer_reviews.title: The WORST pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: We've used this Pressure Washer only twice and now it won't turn on. It worked just fine both times it was used. Not only did we pay more in December for this ($109), but our return window has closed and the "product support window" (whatever that is) has also closed. So, what does this say about the company / vendor who sells this product? Basically, they hope that it will last until your support window has closed so they don't have to worry about replacing it since it appears, after reading the reviews, that it WILL NOT LAST. This is a sub-par quality product with poor service to match. Find another pressure washer to buy.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE CHRISTINE MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Early delivery -- all is good!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today, so I haven't had a chance to try it out, but it appears to be exactly what I wanted. In fact, it arrived a day before the stated delivery date, so that made it even nicer. The only problem I had at first was attaching the different nozzles to the "gun," but I found out I wasn't pressing down on them hard enough. Once I figured that out, they worked fine. The box was pretty battered up, but that was very likely the delivery company. I was relieved to see that there was no damage to the pressure washer itself, and expect it to work fine. Happy Father's Day to me! :)
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K.

customer_reviews.title: I love this power washer
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW. I love this power washer. I used it all day today and It cleaned my vinyl siding, concrete, wood decking and everything else I threw at it without a problem. This is a work horse. Easy to use, easy to set up and easy to put away when done. If you are looking for a really good electric power washer..you just found it. Don't hesitate and don't think twice. Go ahead and get it and GET R DONE!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Gfell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pressure washer! I had bought a different model and sent it back because my garden hose worked just as well. I am a female, age 70, and I had no trouble using this washer. It was easy to set up and operate and it did a fabulous job. My only problem is that it works so well that I keep finding things to use it on such as my car, cement walkway, wooden fence, etc., etc, etc!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Daily

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this power washer and thought it worked perfect the first 4 or 5 times I used it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this power washer and thought it worked perfect the first 4 or 5 times I used it. Then the power wand and nozzle were leaking like crazy, and there was NO pressure. I took everything apart to find the problem, and couldn't find anything. So, I went online to try and find a replacement wand and nozzle. There is no such thing. Because it is an off brand, there is no way to replace any of the parts. Do yourself a favor...pay a few extra dollars for a brand that offers replacement parts!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully a winner
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest and say I haven't hooked it up yet. The handle was cracked/cut my palm and I was going to return it until I found out it could not be exchanged at the lightening deal pricing - which was a super deal. So I taped it over. I'm F/66 and currently have a gas PW and just couldn't yang the starter anymore. If this equipment works just half as good as it says it does, I will be pleased for sure. I like it's portability, easy access to parts, simplicity of use........so before one of my neighbors reports me for using water, I'll try it out.. I'm in the Bay Area!!!
customer_reviews.author: INSWMN

customer_reviews.title: Ivation Absolutely Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This product right here is the best all around pressure washer in my opinion. It comes with absolutely everything needed, including different nozzles and turbo wand. I've used it a ton of times since purchasing on a number of different thing. My favorite by far is using it with a foam cannon that I also purchased on Amazon to wash cars. It is a breeze to set up and also to put away. If you have any questions regarding this awesome product, I am willing to answer.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Yet another failed wand.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first few uses. Then something went wrong inside the wand housing and it pisses unmetered pressurized water through the housing whenever the unit is turned on. It is now unsafe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Country Livin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME MACHINE...
customer_reviews.text: Son borrowed it even before I took it out of the box. He gave it the nod of approval. Did some clean up around the house and power washed his boat before putting it in the water. He had bought another brand and had to return it. Kept cutting off. Not a problem with this one. Now I wish he’d come over and clean up around my house!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy H

customer_reviews.title: Great for close range
customer_reviews.text: It's a great for close range washing project, like deck, garage floor, car, truck and etc. Soap dispenser with different spray angle attachments make it even more effective for the close range washing projects. However, it's no as effective for long range washing projects like washing house sidings that are about 10/20 ft away (closer to or half way to the roof). That was my original intent with this washer. I guess 2200 psi not enough for that kind of stuff? Not sure. People tells me a gas washer might have been good for project like that.
customer_reviews.author: Riad

customer_reviews.title: Worked, but did not last
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about two years of minimal use. I used it on maybe 20 different occasions. The unit was stored in my basement over the winter and then would not turn on the following year. I checked fuses and wiring and there were no obvious issues, so I'm guessing the motor died like a lot of reports have claimed. For what this costs, it should have lasted longer than it did for the amount that I used it. The one year warranty is essentially useless, as it seems these units stop working after about a year or two of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is easy to set up and operate. It does a very good job, but is slower than my old gas power washer. On the other hand the maintenance on that power washer was very time consuming and constant, so I have opted for simpler with this product. I also like the pump motor shut off when the spray trigger is released, so I am not ruining my pump while I move items or need to answer a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Woodrow

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: my initial review said I was not happy the print in the "how to" manual was so dang small. With help from people who have better eye sight than I do - it was put together, and put to use today. I LOVE IT!!! Did a wonderful job clearing moss and mold from concrete. I am so happy I have this. Just would still like to see larger print on the manual!
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: Good concept with all attachments included, but...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in the winter of 2016 for use in the summer. Used it about 5 times in the summer. It worked well. Used it about 4 times in the simmer of 2017. Worked great. Then used it 1 time in the spring of 2018 and it clonked out during use. so 9 uses and its done seems pretty bad to me. It feels like a good machine with plenty of attachments but 9 uses? Maybe it was just a bad part but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: AKS7

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Works great lots of nice features like on board storage of tips and wands. I like when you release the trigger the unit stops running.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Irby

customer_reviews.title: Bad design.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Big issue comes with the soap dispenser: can't control the soap and it seems to only dispense with one of the knozzles. Plus you can't remove the soap when your changing jobs. I had to up end the machine to dump out general cleaner and refine with car soap. Bad design... Instruction box is extremily vague and printed with the smallest font on the planet. I googled the book just so I could see what I was missing .... also the wand fittings are not standard. Twist lock wands with a standard end fitting
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviews on here, I used this product for just over 1 year. All of a sudden, the machine will no longer turn on. I haven't contacted customer service yet, but I am sure there is nothing they can do since with warranty is expired. I recommend purchasing a more durable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Quality metal nozzles also with metal quick connect for much better control of different spray patterns for different projects
customer_reviews.text: This is my third electric power washer and I'm impressed. Clean design with quality materials. Metal quick connect for the garden hose. Quality metal nozzles also with metal quick connect for much better control of different spray patterns for different projects. More pressure with larger pattern than my other power washers. Gets the job done faster. Built in detergent makes it even better. Glad I bought it. There lots of terrible videos on You Tube, but the Sky Mall video is terrific and shows all the features. don't know if the link below will work. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Mr Speedy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have for all your needs!
customer_reviews.text: We have had paint on our porch for over a year. How long it was there prior to that I don't know. My husband had the paint cleaned up in under thirty minutes. The change in my porch from what he pressure washed and hasn't is incredible! It was really easy to assemble and I love that everything has a place that it goes. That makes it so much easier to find things when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: was equal if not better (due to lack of setup required for its operation) ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a gas powered unit which had to many problems with gasoline. This one, out of the box, was equal if not better (due to lack of setup required for its operation) and performed just as the 2500 psi gas unit did. It is much more convenient to use and easier to move to different locations. Much lighter and I was very impressed by the solution container and its applications. I would have given it 5 stars but the the connector to the sprayers hose semi-stripped out making the connector somewhat tedious to screw in. I circumvented that by not disconnecting it after uses. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Very good power washer.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for normal pressure washing. We purchased this mainly to wash the driveway of the acorns that drop and smash. It is probably not suited for that. However, we have some white bricks around the oak tree that are constantly mildewed from lack of sun, and this washer did a fine job. They now looks white again. It does not take up much room in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: KaBo

customer_reviews.title: Unit didn’t even last a year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Ivation 2200 psi pressure washer on February 6th 2018 it will now after bleeding air from unit with hose water on until steady stream exits wand made weird noises and will not power up.Repeated attempts resetting braker checking water flow...all fine unit will not work.Unit was used lightly on and off residential boat washing and around the house...junk for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve l.

customer_reviews.title: It is really nice having all of the attachments together instead of searching ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting a pressure washer for so long, I gave this one a chance. It is really nice having all of the attachments together instead of searching for them. For me it's pretty powerful. Our neighbor purchased a similar one at the store and has way more issues than this one with theirs. Their washer doesn't seem as powerful either. I love that it has the soap dispenser so it's now easy to wash anything at home. My truck is cleaner than its ever been. It's very easy to operate and store. I think I found his new favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Nicely arranged with all accessories within easy reach and all ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Nicely arranged with all accessories within easy reach and all portable as a unit. Only 4 stars because there is no easy way to drain the soap container and the instructions say to drain and rinse the soap container after each use. It entails turning the unit almost upside down to drain, which means all the tools, etc. have to be removed. A real pain!
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Owned 2 yrs almost,used 11 times
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using this unit, it worked great. Over the use of 11 times it broke down. I didn't use it often or for long periods of time. The last, 11th time, it stoped working. This really sucks! I had more faith in this product. Unfortunately it did not work as expected. Just wish people could buy a product that would last. Friends told me don't buy this and I did any way. Do not buy This! It will not last.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one season
customer_reviews.text: I used it three times last year. Tugged away in the shed over winter. It was powerful and fun to use. This year, I took it out, plugged everything in, turned the water on, and waterfall came out of the gun handle! I tried tightening the screws (they didn't budge) and thought I could power wash even with water gushing out of the handle. No such luck. I'm so disappointed. Ivation does sell parts, but I will need to pay $19.99 + $8.00 for both the gun handle and the high pressure hose. That is just not right!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, I was very worried about it not having enough power, but my worries have been laid to rest. This is a great pressure washer, easy to use, no issues what so ever. First test was my front porch, which turned into my whole house and three car driveway. Ran solid for 8 hours and finished the job ready to wash my car.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and used it once and it worked great. However, after using it the soap leaked out of the intake port and ran all over my garage floor. The second time I tried to use it it worked for a few seconds and quit. I checked the power to the motor and it is getting power so apparently the motor is blown. I loved how it worked when it worked, but $150.00 per use is a bit much. After checking the return policies I have discovered that I apparently have no recourse.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pressure washer. It's light enough to carry around one handed. It uses standard pressure washing tips. I like everything about this compact unit except two behaviors it has. First, it takes several minutes to fully prime so I keep the trigger pulled until the spray pattern is stable before switching the unit on. Second, once switched on and running when you release the trigger you must let the pump completely run down before re-squeezing the trigger or the unit tends to dry run. Other than these two behaviors it works great.
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Cheap plastic piece broke inside wand.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. You get what you pay for. Worked great for a year (8-10 uses). Pulled it out to use it after being stored away for the winter and the wand leaked. One of the plastic pieces inside the wand is leaking at the seam. The power washer is now useless as I cannot find a replacement wand.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not good pressure, questionable quality.
customer_reviews.text: I found this Ivation pressure washer to be severely lacking in power and cleaning ability. Only the 0 degree and scrubber even managed to remove bird droppings from my siding. None actually cleaned the siding. It was also very temper-mental as far as producing a stream. I would often have to wait 5-10 seconds after releasing the trigger before i could start again. Otherwise it would just produce a dripping stream. I have excellent water pressure in case anyone thinks that could be a factor. I returned it and will be shopping for a gas powered unit instead.
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Still Working, I Like It!
customer_reviews.text: Still working. I like this. Fixing to start using it a lot again. Pressure wash the roof, sidewalks, brick on house, sheds, pool fence. Another spring and summer of pressure washing. Haven't tried it with my cars yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: Pressure wash the crap out of stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Day 1 - this thing works great! Cleaned both cars and the sidewalk in 2 hours! Soap dispenser works with my McGuiers gold which was unexpected but it was nice to be able to simply switch tips and rinse, no foam cannon or any fancy order to add/dilute/drain etc... Love it! Will update if anything changes but great product and my expandahose fits in the basket too!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love this very handy pressure washer. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Now this is one very handy pressure washer. If you don't need something that will blow you to mars and back, this is the one for you. I love the fact that it turns off as soon as you release the pressure washer handle. It's so handy for those of us who only use it a couple times a year for the house etc. No gummed up mess in the carb or gas going bad but it has plenty of pressure for most jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy

customer_reviews.title: This pressure washer did not last.  DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for very light home use. We used it less than 10 times for less than 2 hours with each use. The last time, it just stopped working after 10 minutes. No way to contact the seller. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a huge gas power pressure washer but it is really is to intimidating for me to use. We also have a small electric pressure washer but it isnt made well and leaked from all the fittings. I took a chance and bought this pressure washer when it was on sale. I have used it see times around my house since getting it and love it. It has quick connect fittings which make setting everything up really easy. Nothing leaked and it worked perfectly for what I needed. So far I have cleaned my driveway, power washed my siding, cleaned my steps from slippery algae and washed my car.
customer_reviews.author: Tylitha French

customer_reviews.title: Does not work in less than 60 days
customer_reviews.text: This item hasn't been two months since I received it and already stopped working. The pump will not work, there is no pressure whatsoever and now I am stuck with it because the time frame to return is only 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Olivo

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Wish the hose wraps were on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Wish the hose wraps were on a reel. They always seem to fall off the hooks. This is powerful, but works best it used with a pressure washer detergent. I noticed some drippage from the connection to the hose. After checking and rechecking, I realized that the brass fitting (that's attached to the unit itself) was loose. I tightened that and it seems to work fine now. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BMW1951

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I waited so long....
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I waited this long to purchase a pressure washer. This one came up on my Amazon Fire as a deal of the day for $`149.95 so I bit. Once in hand, I found many uses for this washer like cleaning off a concrete patio that had been overtaken by mold etc over the years. Just using the high pressure washer and no cleaner, the patio looks like new. Other uses included cleaning scum from my boats hull, siding on my home and removing tree sap etc from windows. I highly recommend this high pressure washer. I hope the quality is there for long lasting service.
customer_reviews.author: Ottomatic

customer_reviews.title: Stalling and unable to reach 2nd story homes.
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer would not reach the 2nd story wall of my house. The water hose connecting to the washer would leak. The washer will start stalling and make weird noises after running for 15 mins or so. I had to turn off ever once in a while so it doesn't happen. The turbo spray doesn't seem to be powerful as it say it is. it seem weaker than the red nozzle. another issue is that there is not a replacement or a universal part replacement for this. so you can not buy any extension wand or gun spray for it. I started a return for this and will look at some other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: This has been perfect. I love the simplicity of it
customer_reviews.text: I got this pressure washer be used my little one wants to play outside constantly and the outside. Honestly it could use some TLC between the concrete and her climbing toys. This has been perfect. I love the simplicity of it. Plug it in and connect the hoses and boom you are ready to go. The tips all have their own convienent home and are easy to access. The power cord is 35 ft long and hasn't come up too short for me. I love the fact I'm not concerned about running out of gas midway through a project or having to worry about controlling the throttle and choke to get it to start.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer VanBuren

customer_reviews.title: Write your name with it :)
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this! Yes, there are stronger, fancier ones, but this is a very nice pressure washer for the price. It has five different nozzles to attach to it. My husband had fun playing around with each one of them. He was able to write his name with the one that was the hardest pressure. Now that was entertaining :). My pictures are from cleaning our extra nasty back porch. It had not been done in a long time and had almost an algae covering on it. Looks great now.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cazzie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine for a women to use
customer_reviews.text: Once I worked out how to use this, it was awesome. Basic manual isn't very helpful. I cleaned my back concrete slab which is approximately 11x 20. Slow which was expected but awesome job of cleaning. I'm looking forward to cleaning deck. Will download a manual so I know what nozzle to use. All in all as a single women, am really happy I purchased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad little pressure washer. It can be a pain trying to maneuver it around when washing the car. The hose could be longer and more flexible. The hose that attaches to the spray nozzle is very stiff and all it wants to do is go back to being coiled up. I have used this multiple times washing the car and I cleaned both upper and lower porches. It really works well cleaning concrete surfaces. Eventually I will buy a longer and more flexible hose to use with it. All in all, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Walker

customer_reviews.title: Leaks everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: This washer worked once but then the plastic components inside the handle failed. The plastic pieces leaked down the crease where they were originally molded to. I attempted to fix these components with plumbers tape and flex seal but the amount of pressure they're required made repair impossible. The inbound quick latch water valve also leaked. This may have been due to the use of an x hose but I doubt it given the other issues with the components. The leaking was extensive enough to prevent any pressurization so I was forced to throw the entire thing away. Lastly, don't leave soap in the machine. It will rot your O rings at every junction.
customer_reviews.author: SchatzOne

customer_reviews.title: Better than my last Pressure Washer
customer_reviews.text: Used it for first time and it is way better than my prior PW. The hooks for the cords are big and easy to use and it works well. The only reason I am giving 4 instead of 5 stars is because the container for cleaning products is hard to get product into. The hole is small (smaller than even a water hose) and I am not sure you can use the product with any of the other spray valves (25, 15, etc) besides the one meant for the solution. I will have to use more to figure out if that is the case or not. Regardless I was very happy while using this product.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Do NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst item I have ever purchased! Worked once. The next time I plugged it in it smoked and wouldn't push any water. Was missing some of the nozzles but I wouldn't have used them anyway. After this review, I was contacted by the company. They were very friendly and sent me a NEW pressure washer free of charge. I will be trying it out in the near future and will be editing my review soon!
customer_reviews.author: mmsmith

customer_reviews.title: IT SUCKS! No
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in early 2017 to power wash such things as the house, the RV and the crab traps. I used it for the first time today. IT SUCKS! No, I am really not joking about this. I worked for about three minutes and then died after smelling like it was on fire. I have tried other sockets, and it will no longer run. This is money that is wasted because now I can't return it and I am out a pressure washer. DO NOT invest your money, time or energy into this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: This machine does not come with a parts list, working diagram, or a list of service centers. They have none. It is made to through away if it breaks after 12 months; which mine did. 12-months and 14 days. They said " it was defective." and would not make it good. Thus I am out the money and the machine. These cannot be fixed. I only used mine 4-5 times. I learned a real lesson. If you don't get a parts list and working diagram, it's a throw-away if it breaks after warranty. In this case 14 days after.
customer_reviews.author: Donald G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer works great! It comes with multiple nozzles including one for soap/detergent. It was easy to put the hose,wand and nozzle on and had very easy to understand directions. It only took about 5-10 minutes to put the pieces together and start power washing. It works extremely well. I've removed mold from the rain water off the brick of my house, power washed the driveway and my wooden gate. It all came out like new!! The hose is quite long which is convenient as is the the power cord. It has wheels and was easily movable. I would purchase again without hesitation. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erica C

customer_reviews.title: would like to return and get my refund
customer_reviews.text: After spending 2.5/3.0 hours attempting to getting this unit to work, and many more on other days,I give up, would like to return and get my refund. I used the recommendations sent to me with no results. It is not fun having a unit that will not work as advertised. Please contact me with what my options are. Hugh Hagerman 810 348-3700 hghagerman@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly but item was missing one of the nozzle attachments, item was covered in an oily substance and looked like it was previously opened and not a new item. I never got to try the pressure washer as I returned it immediately. Very disappointed, it looked like it would have been a good product. I will purchase a different pressure washer from a local store instead.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite toy! Worked great on my old aggregate patio and the concrete tiles around the pool. I've never used a gas powered model so don't know how it compares, but this washer seems powerful enough, and much easier than dealing with a gasoline engine. Sturdy & well-made -- I've only used it five times so far, but have no reason to think it won't last. The hose connector is metal (unlike the leaky plastic one complained about in the reviews of the Sun Joe washer) so that's another plus. My only criticism is that the instructions are poorly written, otherwise, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great little pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pressure washer. It's lightweight and easy to use. For an electric pressure washer it has a lot of power. I really like all the different sprayer nozzles. I like that you can pour soap into a little reservoir instead of having a hose that draws soap out of a container. My only complaint is if soap is left in the dispenser it can leak out of where the water hose attaches. spray everything out of the wand to avoid built up pressure. Overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I immediacy put this machine to work, and after many hours of work cleaning muddy Jeeps, front porch and house siding I am glad I bought this unit. It had everything I needed to start, including many spray heads. It turned my grey and green wood porch back to a beautiful brown again. It has the power to damage, which is nice. Just keep back far enough on certain surfaces like paint you dont want to blast off, or wood you dont want to etch just like you would any pressure washer. The power and price tag make this great for me, a home owner that has a Jeep to play in.
customer_reviews.author: MudDan

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but in cost me $20 to have it boxed ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unit in March 2017 and it stopped working in August 2017 motor died. Called Ivation due to 1 yr. warranty and was told to return it for a new one. Of course I threw the Box out the week before it died. Told me to take it to a UPS store to ship it back. Sounds great but in cost me $20 to have it boxed and $80 to ship it back. And they will not reimburse me for these charges. The Fricking unit only cost me $150. Don't buy It...!!! Go to Costco better return policy if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Montorio

customer_reviews.title: Great.  Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I read a review that stated this machine will clean the driveway. Yes it does. and depending on how long you waited on the Vinyl fence, it does a good job there too. One great advantage is the water hose hook is an attachment. which come off easy when you are done, making it easier to unhook the hose. Started up quick too!
customer_reviews.author: David Scott Longstreth

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. Lasted less than one year. 1st the ground fault went out on it..... had it replaced then the motor went out one month later. The hose was all but impossible to take on and off after several uses. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC !
customer_reviews.text: After borrowing my parents gas washer for my fence I decided NEVER again. I found this washer with the same PSI as the gas and I will never use gas again. FANTASTIC washer going on year two. I took it to my parents to wash around steps and a bench for them. My mom ordered one for herself ! She is 80 years old and has no problem rolling it around.
customer_reviews.author: sprinklerchicks

customer_reviews.title: Great for wash car
customer_reviews.text: Got this on amazon day deal because it was on sale. Been about a year, has been working great for washing my car. Don't even mess with on board soap disspensor because you can not turn it on or off and it is picky with the soap. Just pickup a foam cannon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Knock off brand. Finding chicken teeth is easier than finding replacement parts for this junk. Used it one year, go back to use it again and it leaks like a sieve from the wand/hose connection. Gets better, the wand and hose are ONE PIECE so you can’t even tighten it!! JUNK!! You can’t just replace the wand or the hose. Thought I would save money - now I have to go buy the pressure washer I couldn’t afford so I have a working unit.
customer_reviews.author: CK1256

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - Broke after 1 Summer
customer_reviews.text: This pressure was absolute trash. DO NOT BUY!! I used it for 1 summer without problems, brought it out in early spring the following year to clean off my patio and it ran for 5 minutes and died. I had it for less than 14 months and it died. Spend a couple more dollars and get a quality pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: It arrived the next day even though I was expecting a two day delivery. I opened up the box and put the unit together. It was quite simple. I selected the type of spray I wanted and I proceeded to pressure wash my deck. It went much faster than my old pressure washer and it was noticeably cleaner than I had ever gotten it before. I am more than satisfied with my purchase and I have already claimed my ownership and warned anyone to stay away from my pressure washer. If they want it so much, they can buy their own.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Compact & powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been needing a Pressure washer for some time for many tasks and have gotten tired of going to rent. Ran across this one and the reviews looked good. I was concerned about the power since it is electric, but it have plenty of power to clean the deck, siding and cars. Plus no gasoline spills or exhaust to deal with. Love the many nozzles and soap dispenser. After having used the big boys from the rental store, this 2200 PSI is more than enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: really nice and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: first usage, and it already paid itself. it was powerful enough for us to cleanup our back patio, removing a lot of dirt.. really nice and easy to operate. I have seen some users complaining, but from what I could see this is just like any other equipment, treat it well and it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Clebert

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great 3 times then over winter the inside metal hose connectors corroded and went to use today and water leaking from gun like a sieve. How do I get satisfaction from this?
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Does not reach second story!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about a year ago. It works just fine except for the fact that the extender want (the one that's supposed to allow you to reach the second story), will absolutely not attach. I have tried everything! Initially contacted Amazon, but I would have had to send back the whole machine (and I was in the middle of a project that needed to be done). Being able to reach the second story was the reason I purchased this product. Other than that, it works great! If someone knows of a trick to make the extender wand work...pass it along and I will give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money. Spend a little extra and get a better power washer.
customer_reviews.text: I can get the same pressure out of using my thumb and the hose. Design is awful, two of the five tips that connect to the pressure washer were inside the machine when I unpacked it. Took almost 30 minutes to fish them out.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Guffey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This is crap! It worked for 10 minutes (at most) and hasn't turned on again since. We have tried to do everything to get it to work, but it's not even powering up. I checked for blockages in the hose connections, checked the power box, even took it to my mom's house to try it there thinking maybe it was something with our outside outlets. Nothing has worked and now it looks like we can't even return it because we are past the return period! Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: stlhr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Right out of the bock it was easy to set up it did an amazing job cleaning my back cement patio and front walkway. Made such a difference in the look of my front yard!! The soap dispenser is the best part. Cleaning my son's outdoor toys knowing that they are being washed at the same time is a great feeling. The nozzles are easy to attach and the attachments are simple to ID, store and replace. Highly recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean my lanai and retaining wall. It worked beautifully on the lanai and I did a portion of the wall and I am very happy with the results. The water connection leaks. Update: I purchased this pressure washer Jan 2017 and used it 3 times. The fourth time something broke inside the wand and now it just leaks everywhere and the washer is now useless because you can’t get parts for it! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the product once (albeit for about 4 hours straight). Excellent, excellent, product. The pressure with the smaller degree nozzles is fantastic. The turbo wand keeps getting "jammed" after you use it and let go of the handle. The little nozzle in the head gets stuck in a position that forces you to re-center the nozzle for it to work properly. That's kind of an annoyance, however, I prefer the other nozzles to the turbo fitting so it doesn't really matter much to me. The pressure is great and the machine is a workhorse.
customer_reviews.author: James Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: It works. A few quirks on putting it together and working it for the first time but it does an amazing job. This is all you need for home sized cleaning jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Labamigo

customer_reviews.title: The best pressure washer we've had
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product that exceeded our expectations. It arrived promptly, as is the usual fine service provided by Amazon. Thank you Amazon. The washer was entirely put together and ready to use. It is sturdily made, well constructed, works like a charm. My husband could not be happier. He was so pleased with this pressure washer that he took the box that it was packed in to a local dealership and suggested they look into stocking it for their customers rather than the shoddy, plastic pressure washers they currently carried. We have had multiple pressure washers over the years. This one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Jamieson

product_meta.title: Ivation Electric Pressure Washer 2200 PSI 1.8 GPM with Power Hose Nozzle Gun and Turbo Wand, All Parts Included, W/Built in Soap Dispenser
feature_bullets: Incredible Cleaning Power Generated by the 1800 Watt/14.5 amp Motor Outputs a Whopping 1.8 GPM and 2,200 PSI Pressure for Maximum Cleaning and Scrubbing Power
5 Interchangeable High and Low Pressure Nozzles Wash Various Surfaces (0º, 15º, 25º, 40º and soap); Bonus Turbo Wand Included
Easy-to-Use System Requires Just 30-Second Setup w/Three Simple Attachments, The Unique Copper Connections are Easily Joined to Hose and Nozzle for Quick, Effortless Hookup
Power Washer Features Safety Automatic Total Stop System (TSS), Optional Self Suction, & Soap Dispenser

Ideal Pressure Cleaning Solution for all Types of Vehicles, Cars, SUV’s, ATV’s, Boats, RVs, and Homes, Driveways, Decks and Patios, Easily Gets rid of Dirt, Grime, Gunk, Oil, Rust, Mildew and Grease and the Toughest Spots - Includes a 1 Year Warranty - DISCLAIMER: Make sure water supply is on or the motor will break.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars1,423 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
